Body:
resp = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub')
assert resp.status_code == 400
resp2 = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub', data={'hub.mode':
    'unknown', 'hub.topic': 'http://example.com', 'hub.callback':
    'http://unimportant/'})
assert resp2.status_code == 400
resp3 = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub', data={'hub.mode':
    'subscribe', 'hub.topic': 'http://example.com', 'hub.callback':
    'http://unimportant/', 'hub.lease_seconds': 10000000000000000000})
assert resp3.status_code == 202
resp4 = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub', data={'hub.mode':
    'subscribe', 'hub.topic': 'http://example.com', 'hub.callback':
    'http://unimportant/', 'hub.lease_seconds': -10})
assert resp4.status_code == 400
resp5 = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub', data={'hub.mode':
    'subscribe', 'hub.topic': 'http://example.com', 'hub.callback':
    'http://unimportant/', 'hub.secret': 'X' * 1024})
assert resp5.status_code == 400
resp6 = requests.post('http://localhost:5001/hub', data={'hub.mode':
    'publish', 'hub.topic': 'http://localhost:5001/ping'})
assert resp6.status_code == 202
